scripts.build: npm run install:deps && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:deps: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.deploy:check: npm run test:build && echo '배포 준비 완료! DEPLOYMENT.md를 참고하세요.'
